arts.ttl: How to stream West Ham vs Tottenham, the Plausible XI and of course, our prediction!
arts.sum: West Ham is currently sitting 16th in the table, and Tottenham is in 4th after three matches. Key storylines for fans will undoubtedly include Tottenham's new signing, Mohammed Kudus, facing his former club, West Ham, and both teams dealing with injuries (e.g., West Ham without Niclas Füllkrug due to a calf issue; Tottenham monitoring Dominic Solanke's fitness).
